control.viewcomunication.translation

Interface EntitiesDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntitiesDatabaseImpl

    public interface EntitiesDatabase
    This interface declare methods to manage a database that associate to each game entity to view representation.
    Author:
    Matteo Magnani

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dimension getArenaDimension() 
      Entities getViewEntity(java.lang.Integer code)
      Get the view representation of the input entity code.
      java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> putBulletsAndSetCodes(java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> bullets)
      Put the input bullets in the database with the relative view representation according to code of the entity that have fired it.Returns a copy of the entity with the appropriate univocal code.
      void putEntities(java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> entities, Entities entity)
      Put the input entities in the database with the relative view representation.
      java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> putEntitiesAndSetCodes(java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> entities, Entities entity)
      Put the input entities in the database with the relative view representation.
      void putEntity(EntitiesInfo modelEnt, Entities entity)
      Put the input entity in the database with the relative view representation.
      void putEntity(java.lang.Integer code, Entities entity)
      Put the input entity's code in the database with the relative view representation.
      EntitiesInfo putEntityAndSetCode(EntitiesInfo modelEnt, Entities entity)
      Put the input entity in the database with the relative view representation and returns a copy of the entity with the appropriate univocal code.

        Put the input entity's code in the database with the relative view representation.

        code - The code of the entity
        entity - The entity's view representation

      • putEntityAndSetCode

        EntitiesInfo putEntityAndSetCode(EntitiesInfo modelEnt,
                                 Entities entity)

        Parameters:
        modelEnt - The entity to put in database
        entity - The entity's view representation
        Returns:
        A copy of the entity with the appropriately code appropriately

      • putBulletsAndSetCodes

        java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> putBulletsAndSetCodes(java.util.List<EntitiesInfo> bullets)

        Parameters:
        bullets - The list of bullets to put in database
        Returns:
        A copy of the entity with the appropriately code appropriately
